string_table.string: Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.
To watch this video, use the preview feature in Storyline 360, upload your published output to a server, publish to Review 360, or switch to static video quality.
Streaming video is unavailable for local playback.
You must complete the question before submitting.
Enter your name in the field below:
You have reached the time limit set for the quiz. Press 'OK' to continue.

slidelink.displaytext: Aspects to consider when reviewing a source

resource_data.description: Here are some useful links and documents:

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Welcome to Temple University Libraries online module!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Now let’s take a closer look at several source types and consider each aspect. Click each type to learn more." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="While knowing the characteristics of sources types is helpful, it is also important to consider how you use your sources. Any type of source might be appropriate for a research project, depending on how you use it. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Let’s take a look at the BEAM method, developed by Joseph Bizup.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Click each to learn more." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Contact a librarian or specialist for additional help!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
